import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './RSVP.css'; const RSVP = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', attendance: '', guests: 1, allergies: '', song: '', message: '' }); const [isSubmitted, setIsSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Aquí normalmente enviarías los datos a un servidor console.log('RSVP enviado:', formData); setIsSubmitted(true); }; if (isSubmitted) { return (
